account-disable-2fa-create-form-tooltip-: National identity card, passport, residence permit or driving licence
You are permitted to hide sensitive information, but the first name, surname and expiry date must be readable
account-disable-2fa-create-form-field-pr: Proof of address (less than 3 months old)
Proof of existence of the business/organisation
account-disable-2fa-create-form-tooltip-: KBIS, companies register, business licence, etc.
The address on your customer account must match the address on the supporting document

account-disable-2fa-create-form-field-ge: Minutes of the last general meeting

account-disable-2fa-create-form-field-ot: Any other documents you deem useful for your identification
